trans-unit.source: Provides an external process for running add-ins out-of-process from the host application.
trans-unit.target: 从主机应用程序中运行外接程序扩展的过程中提供外部进程。

trans-unit.source: To activate an add-in in an external process, pass an AddInProcess object to the appropriate <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要激活外接程序在外部进程，请将 AddInProcess 对象传递给相应<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法重载。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The executable that runs the add-in is obtained from one of two files installed with the .NET Framework under the Windows directory.
trans-unit.target: 从随 Windows 目录下.NET Framework 一起安装的两个文件之一获取外接程序运行的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the executable that matches the bits-per-word of the host application is used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用与主机应用程序每字位数相匹配的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: If the host is a 64-bit process, AddInProcess.exe is run; otherwise, AddInProcess32.exe is run.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机是 64 位进程，则会运行 AddInProcess.exe;否则，运行 AddInProcess32.exe。

trans-unit.source: To specify the way the executable is selected, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.%23ctor%28System.AddIn.Hosting.Platform%29> constructor to create the AddInProcess object.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定选择可执行文件的方式，使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.%23ctor%28System.AddIn.Hosting.Platform%29>构造函数来创建 AddInProcess 对象。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.%23ctor%28System.AddIn.Hosting.Platform%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor has the same effect as using the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.%23ctor%28System.AddIn.Hosting.Platform%29> constructor with the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.Platform?displayProperty=fullName> flag, to specify that the process that runs the add-in will have the same bits-per-word as the host process.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数具有相同的效果与使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.%23ctor%28System.AddIn.Hosting.Platform%29>具有构造函数<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.Platform?displayProperty=fullName>标志，以指定外接程序运行的进程将具有与主机进程相同-每字位数。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.Platform?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.%23ctor%28System.AddIn.Hosting.Platform%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref> class, specifying the bits-per-word of the process in which the add-in runs.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref>类，指定在其中外接程序运行的进程每字位数。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how `platform` affects the bits-per-word of the process on different operating systems: ||32-bit operating system|64-bit operating system| |-|------------------------------|------------------------------| |Host|32-bit|Same as the host process| |AnyCPU|32-bit|64-bit| |X86|32-bit|32-bit| |X64|Exception is thrown|64-bit|
A value that specifies the bits-per-word of the process that runs the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指定的外接程序运行的进程每字位数。

trans-unit.source: The registry entry for the path to the executable (AddInProcess.exe or AddInProcess32.exe) is missing.
trans-unit.target: 找不到可执行文件 （AddInProcess.exe 或 AddInProcess32.exe） 的路径的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: -or- The executable is missing.
trans-unit.target: -或者-未提供可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref> object represents the host application process.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否当前<xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref>对象表示主机应用程序进程。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `true`, the add-in is running in-process with the host application.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是`true`外, 接程序是过程与主机应用程序。

trans-unit.source: In that case, using the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.Start%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.Shutdown%2A> method throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.Start%2A>或<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.Shutdown%2A>方法将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.Shutdown%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment.Process%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property returns an <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess> object that represents the host application process if the add-in is running in-process.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment.Process%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性返回<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>表示主机应用程序进程，如果外接程序正在运行进程内的对象。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment.Process%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref> object corresponds to the current process; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref>对象都对应于当前进程; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to keep the external process alive.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使该外部进程保持活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `false` to aggressively shut down the external process after the last add-in inside the process has been shut down.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`false`后关闭的最后一个外接程序在过程主动地关闭该外部进程。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the external process should be kept alive; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该外部进程应保持活动状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bits-per-word of the process in which the out-of-process add-in is run.
trans-unit.target: 获取在其中运行的进程外外接程序的进程每字位数。

trans-unit.source: The bits-per-word is set when the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess> object is initialized, and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 时，将设置每字位数<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>对象会初始化，并不能更改。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>

trans-unit.source: The bits-per-word of the process that runs the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 每字位数的外接程序运行的进程。

trans-unit.source: Gets the process ID of the external process.
trans-unit.target: 获取该外部进程的进程 ID。

trans-unit.source: Use this property for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性进行调试。

trans-unit.source: The process ID, or -1 if the external process has not started.
trans-unit.target: 进程 ID 或如果该外部进程尚未启动的-1。

trans-unit.source: Forcibly shuts down the external process.
trans-unit.target: 强制关闭该外部进程。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the external process was running and is successfully shut down; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there is no active process associated with the <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该外部进程已运行，并且关闭成功的情况下;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>与存在处于不活动状态如果关联进程<xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The add-in is running in-process with the host application.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序是过程与主机应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Starting and stopping the process is allowed only for external processes, not for the host process.
trans-unit.target: 启动和停止该过程仅允许使用外部进程，不适用于主机进程。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the process represented by the <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref> object is about to be shut down.
trans-unit.target: 通过所表示的进程时发生<xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess"></xref>对象即将关闭。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Starts the external process.
trans-unit.target: 启动外部进程。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the process is successfully started; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the process is already running.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功启动进程;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果该进程已运行。

trans-unit.source: The add-in is running in-process with the host application.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序是过程与主机应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Starting and stopping the process is allowed only for external processes, not for the host process.
trans-unit.target: 启动和停止该过程仅允许使用外部进程，不适用于主机进程。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of seconds to allow for the process to start.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要启动的进程的允许的秒数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 10 秒。

trans-unit.source: This property is usually used during debugging, to increase the startup time for the process that runs the out-of-process add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常在调试期间，用于增加的进程外外接程序运行的进程的启动时间。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds to allow for process startup.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许进程启动的秒数。

trans-unit.source: The process is already running.
trans-unit.target: 该进程已运行。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值小于 0 （零）。
